# SOCIALCLUB::SC_PROFANITY_CHECK_STRING

## Summary
Submit the given string to profanity checking

## Parameters
* **STRING** textString: String to verified
* **INT\*** outToken: Returned token that can be used to check the status of the pending check

## Returns
* **BOOL**:
True if the request has been been sent to the server for validation.
Use outToken to monitor the status.
If this function returns false, something failed to send the string to the server for validation.

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Starts a task to check an entered string for profanity on the ROS/Social Club services.

See also: 1753344C770358AE, 82E4A58BABC15AE7.
